name: 隨機程序
description: 本課程首先介紹多個隨機變數的相關知識，然後探討隨機變數之間的相關性，最後討論假說測試、估測理論、隨機程序等應用。
goals: 介紹隨機程序的相關工程應用。
培養學生處理多個隨機變數的能力。
培養學生利用隨機變數之間的相關性，進行估測或預測。
培養學生利用假說測試等理論，解決相關工程問題。
syllabus:
Families of continuous random variables (Week 1)

Gaussian random variable (Week 2)

Joint PMF (Week 3)

Joint PDF (Week 4)

Independent random variables (Week 5)

Derived random variables  (Week 6)

Sum of two random variables (Week 7)

Midterm exam (Week 8)

Conditional expected value (Week 9)

Conditioning by a random variable (Week 10)

Expected value of sums (Week 11)

Moment generating function (Week 12)

Hypothesis test (Week 13)

Minimum mean square error estimation (Week 14)

MAP and ML estimate (Week 15)

Final exam (Week 16)

\*Stochastic process (Week 17)

\*Expected value and correlation (Week 18)
